chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
si: sorted_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface
smspi: state_machine_safety'interface
rlmli: refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
pllsi: prevLog_leader_sublog_interface
ctgt0: current_term_gt_zero_interface
lalcii: lastApplied_le_commitIndex_interface
miaei: match_index_all_entries_interface
lhlli: leaders_have_leaderLogs_interface
lci: leader_completeness_interface
lsi: leader_sublog_interface
taifoli: terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface
glci: ghost_log_correct_interface
lphogli: log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs_interface
glemi: ghost_log_entries_match_interface
tci: transitive_commit_interface
tsi: term_sanity_interface
lhllsi: leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface
ollpti: one_leaderLog_per_term_interface
rmri: raft_msg_refinement_interface

Goal:
forall (net : ghost_log_network) (h : Net.name), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> maxIndex_sanity (deghost (mgv_deghost net)) -> lastApplied (snd (nwState net h)) <= maxIndex (log (snd (nwState net h))) /\ commitIndex (snd (nwState net h)) <= maxIndex (log (snd (nwState net h)))

Premises:
maxIndex_sanity = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => maxIndex_lastApplied net /\ maxIndex_commitIndex net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments maxIndex_sanity {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
deghost = fun (base_params : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams base_params) (ghost_params : GhostMultiParams multi_params) (net : network) => {| nwPackets := map deghost_packet (nwPackets net); nwState := fun X : Net.name => match net with | {| nwState := nwState |} => let H := X in let nwState0 := nwState H in let (_, d) := nwState0 in d end |} : forall (base_params : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams base_params) (ghost_params : GhostMultiParams multi_params), network -> network Arguments deghost {base_params multi_params ghost_params}
Inductive msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := MRRIR_init : msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | MRRIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_re
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
Notation log := (RaftState.log term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
Notation lastApplied := (RaftState.lastApplied term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
Module Net := Struct Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Definition data : BaseParams -> Type. Definition input : BaseParams -> Type. Definition output : BaseParams -> Type. Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Definition init : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> data. Definition handler : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> input -> data -> output * data. Record SingleParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_SingleParams { init_handler : data; input_handler :
nwState = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (_, nwState) := n in nwState : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> Net.name -> data Arguments nwState {P params}
maxIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix maxIndex (entries : list entry) : logIndex := match entries with | [] => 0 | e :: _ => eIndex e end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex Arguments maxIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
Notation commitIndex := (RaftState.commitIndex term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
mgv_deghost = fun (base_params : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams base_params) (msg_ghost_params : MsgGhostMultiParams multi_params) (net : network) => {| nwPackets := map mgv_deghost_packet (nwPackets net); nwState := fun X : Net.name => match net with | {| nwState := nwState |} => let H := X in let nwState0 := nwState H in nwState0 end |} : forall (base_params : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams base_params) (msg_ghost_params : MsgGhostMultiParams multi_params), network -> network Arguments mgv_deghost {base_params multi_params msg_ghost_params
ghost_log_network = network : Type
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
msg_commit_recorded_lift_intro : forall (net : ghost_log_network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e <= lastApplied (snd (nwState net h)) \/ eIndex e <= commitIndex (snd (nwState net h)) -> commit_recorded (deghost (mgv_deghost net)) h e
lifted_maxIndex_sanity = fun net : ghost_log_network => (forall h : Net.name, lastApplied (snd (nwState net h)) <= maxIndex (log (snd (nwState net h)))) /\ (forall h : Net.name, commitIndex (snd (nwState net h)) <= maxIndex (log (snd (nwState net h)))) : ghost_log_network -> Prop
commit_recorded_lift_intro : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e <= lastApplied (snd (nwState net h)) \/ eIndex e <= commitIndex (snd (nwState net h)) -> commit_recorded (deghost net) h e
msg_lifted_lastApplied_le_commitIndex : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> lastApplied (snd (nwState net h)) <= commitIndex (snd (nwState net h))
commit_invariant_host = fun net : ghost_log_network => forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e <= commitIndex (snd (nwState net h)) -> lifted_committed net e (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h))) : ghost_log_network -> Prop
lifted_committed = fun (net : ghost_log_network) (e : entry) (t : term) => exists (h : Net.name) (e' : entry), eTerm e' <= t /\ lifted_directly_committed net e' /\ eIndex e <= eIndex e' /\ In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) /\ In e' (log (snd (nwState net h))) : ghost_log_network -> entry -> term -> Prop
msg_lifted_sorted_host : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> sorted (log (snd (nwState net h)))
leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader ->...-> Prop Arguments leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
commit_recorded = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry) => In e (log (nwState net h)) /\ (eIndex e <= lastApplied (nwState net h) \/ eIndex e <= commitIndex (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Net.name -> entry -> Prop Arguments commit_recorded {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
match_index_all_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (e : entry) (leader : Net.name) (h : name), type (snd (nwState net leader)) = Leader -> eIndex e <= assoc_default name_eq_dec (matchIndex (snd (nwState net leader))) h 0 -> In e (log (snd (nwState net leader))) -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net leader)) ->...-> Prop Arguments match_index_all_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
transitive_commit = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (e e' : entry) (t : term), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> In e' (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e <= eIndex e' -> committed net e' t -> committed net e t : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments transitive_commit {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
maxIndex_lastApplied = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, lastApplied (nwState net h) <= maxIndex (log (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments maxIndex_lastApplied {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
maxIndex_commitIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, commitIndex (nwState net h) <= maxIndex (log (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments maxIndex_commitIndex {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
msg_lifted_sms_nw : forall (net : ghost_log_network) (h : Net.name) (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) (e : entry), state_machine_safety (deghost (mgv_deghost net)) -> In p (nwPackets net) -> snd (pBody p) = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> t >= currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) -> commit_recorded (deghost (mgv_deghost net)) h e -> prevLogIndex > eIndex e \/ prevLogIndex = eIndex e /\ prevLogTerm = eTerm e \/ eIndex e > maxIndex entries \/ In e entries
all_the_way_deghost_spec : forall (net : ghost_log_network) (h : Net.name), snd (nwState net h) = nwState (deghost (mgv_deghost net)) h
leaders_have_leaderLogs = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader -> exists ll : list entry, In (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)), ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaders_have_leaderLogs {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
lifted_sms_nw : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) (e : entry), state_machine_safety (deghost net) -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> t >= currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) -> commit_recorded (deghost net) h e -> prevLogIndex > eIndex e \/ prevLogIndex = eIndex e /\ prevLogTerm = eTerm e \/ eIndex e > maxIndex entries \/ In e entries
ghost_log_entries_match_host = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (p : packet), In p (nwPackets net) -> entries_match (log (snd (nwState net h))) (fst (pBody p)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments ghost_log_entries_match_host {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
doLeader_same_commitIndex : forall (st : raft_data) (n : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader st n = (os, st', ms) -> sorted (log st) -> commitIndex st <= maxIndex (log st) -> commitIndex st' <= maxIndex (log st')
lastApplied_le_commitIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, lastApplied (nwState net h) <= commitIndex (nwState net h) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments lastApplied_le_commitIndex {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
lifted_handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : ghost_log_network) (p : ghost_log_packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> snd (pBody p) = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwPackets net) -> sorted (log st')
deghost_spec : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name), nwState (deghost net) h = snd (nwState net h)
msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : name) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h (snd (nwState net h)) = (out, d, l) -> gd = update_elections_data_timeout h (nwState net h) -> P net -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : name) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h (snd (nwState net h)) = (out, d, l) -> gd = update_elections_data_timeout h (nwState net h) -> P net ->...-> Prop Arguments msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
lifted_maxIndex_sanity_append_entries : forall (xs : list ghost_log_packet) (p : ghost_log_packet) (ys : list ghost_log_packet) (net : ghost_log_network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list ghost_log_packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) ->...-> lifted_maxIndex_sanity {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (snd (nwState net h)) client id c = (out, d, l) ->...-> Prop Arguments msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (snd (nwState net h)) client id c = (out, d, l) ->...-> Prop Arguments msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Build_raft_msg_refinement_interface : (forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot P -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net) ->...-> raft_msg_refinement_interface
current_term_gt_zero = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, type (nwState net h) <> Follower -> 1 <= currentTerm (nwState net h) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments current_term_gt_zero {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
msg_lift_prop_all_the_way : forall P : network -> Prop, (forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net) -> forall net : network, msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (deghost (mgv_deghost net))
